desc: Love biking? Fezzari custom fits your bike to you, the rider. Built with the highest quality, our bikes come with a lifetime warranty. Order online and get your bike delivered to your doorstep. Ordering your bike should be fun, just like the trails you'll ride it on.

layout.text: Redesigned from the ground up. The all-new La Sal Peak builds upon the award winning foundation of the previous generation. Now with more travel and refined geometry resulting in a more capable and adrenaline inducing ride.
